E. Security Alarm Systems Inc. provides unparalleled security systems solutions to meet the needs of thousands of residential/commercial customers. We service Miami-Dade, Broward and West Palm Beach counties and have been providing South Florida with installation, maintenance and services since 2007. As a state licensed and insured security systems provider, we offer the following services: service performance for M&S Intercom and CCTV surveillance systems, personal reporting, and self-defense products. We also offer specific self-defense techniques in order to minimize or avoid any potential threats.

Our ultimate goal at E. Security Alarm Systems Inc., is to keep your loved ones safe by providing round the clock protection for your residence and family when you are at home or away. Let our reliable and friendly security experts assist you with taking the first step to ensure your family’s overall safety and security.

Our Services

Peace of mind is worth having.

Have peace of mind by selecting a customized security plan to protect your residence and family while you are at home or away.

A secure business is a successful business.

Secure your business with our monitoring technology. It is the best way to safeguard your company property, protect confidential information and assets.

Products

dmc1CDPACK:
Music/Communication System Package
Includes one dmc1 Music/Communication System Master, one dmc1CD 6-disc Add-on CD Changer, four dmc1RS Room Stations with Remote Scan and Master Volume, one dmc1RW Patio Station with Remote Scan and Master Volume, one MC3 3-Note Chime Module, one DS3B Intercom Door Speaker with Bell Button, one dmc1F Combination Mounting Frame.
dmc4RW:
Retrofit Patio Station with Remote Scan and Master Volume:
This is an outdoor intercom room station with radio remote scan. Its features are master volume control, 4-wire, for dmc3-4 Music/Communication Retrofit System is available in white. This device will allow you to enhance outdoor noise and differentiate things that go bump in the night.
DVR4TL/8TL/16TL160 TL:
Series Triplex Digital Video Recorder Family with Network/DDNS Video Server: Functions like your home DVR box to record any video surveillance in high quality and also give you visual conformation of the disturbance.
VL-650-S/VL-650-W/VL-650IRVF-S/VL-650IRVF-W:
VL-650 Series Color Vandalproof Weatherproof Dome Camera. This state of the art camera is durable and will stand up to the harshest weather conditions. It will be able to accurately surveille the immediate area for potential threats.
